title: 关于 CrazyAuctions 这个竞拍插件的报错
author: aizhi_D
txt_content:

 at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
 at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
 at me.badbones69.crazyauctions.MCUpdate.report(MCUpdate.java:144)
 at me.badbones69.crazyauctions.MCUpdate.lambda$0(MCUpdate.java:66)
 at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:58)
 at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:53)

1.7.2spigot，求解决
